pullRequest.title: Add phone number to free enterprise license request
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add phone number to free enterprise license form.
Closes #8939

commit.message: Add phone number to free enterprise license request

nodes.bodyText: You ask for a "valid" phone number, and you parse its validness via a custom regex, but we do not explain to the user what a "valid" phone number looks like, nor do we automatically mask the number to render "validly".
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -104,6 +139,15 @@ export default class EnterpriseFreeLicenseForm extends React.Component {
                    placeholder="Please provide a valid email address to send the license key to"
                    required
                    onChange={this.handleInput('email')} />
+            <Input type="text"
+                   id="phone"
+                   label="Phone Number"
+                   value={phone}
+                   placeholder="Please provide a valid phone number"

nodes.bodyText: How do we feel about using tel?

                    placeholder="Please provide a valid email address to send the license key to"
                    required
                    onChange={this.handleInput('email')} />
+            <Input type="text"

nodes.bodyText: Should we use HTML5 pattern to validate?

commit.message: Allow parenthesis in phone number, strip multiple spaces, update placeholder text, add 'tel' support to Input
